div.p: The code indicating the type and priority of an inpatient admission associated with the service on an intermediary submitted claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clmipadmsntypecd
This code system https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-clm-ip-admsn-type-cd defines the following codes:
